response.original_title: Platinum Comedy Series: Steve Harvey - One Man
response.overview: Comic and actor Steve Harvey -- star of his own long-running sitcom on the WB network and one of the headlining performers in Spike Lee's concert film The Original Kings of Comedy -- takes the stage in this comedy special originally produced for the HBO premium cable network. Steve Harvey: One Man won a 1999 Vision Award, a prize for television programming that celebrates cultural diversity in America.
response.tagline: Platinum Comedy Series: Steve Harvey - One Man
response.title: Platinum Comedy Series: Steve Harvey - One Man
